## Installation

### `Julia`

To install `Julia` download the latest version from [here](https://julialang.org/downloads).

### `VSCode`

- `VSCode` can be installed at [this link](https://code.visualstudio.com/).

- The extension `Julia` for `VSCode` is available [here](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=julialang.language-julia) mais peut aussi être installée depuis `VSCode` (icône ![](logo_ext_vscode.png)).
